title: The Concept and principles of functional drafting
creator_credit: Industrial Education Films and Majestic Motion Pictures
brief_description: This film is designed to demonstrate to the new person “on the board” as well as the experienced draftsman or designer, what functional drafting can do, mentioning saving in time and cost and improvement in actual drawings. Points out the advantages and some examples of functional drafting. States the basic principles involved in this simplified form of drafting.
